question: Who was the author of 'The Shortest Way with Dissenters' and `A Journey of the Plague Year'?
api_result: The author of 'The Shortest Way with Dissenters' is Daniel Defoe. He is also the author of 'A Journal of the Plague Year,' which is a fictional account based on the real events of the Great Plague of London in 1665. Both works reflect Defoe's keen observations and commentary on society during his time.
